name: Frank BOLUS v. Charles BOLUS and George Bolus (two cases). Appeal of George BOLUS. Appeal of Anna BOLUS, Executrix of the Estate of Frank Bolus, Deceased

judges: Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN and FLAHERTY, JJ.
parties: Frank BOLUS v. Charles BOLUS and George Bolus (two cases). Appeal of George BOLUS. Appeal of Anna BOLUS, Executrix of the Estate of Frank Bolus, Deceased.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM:
The petitions for allowance of appeal having been improvidently granted, the appeals are dismissed.
Each party to pay own costs.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Philip H. Williams, Stroudsburg, Carlon M. O’Malley, Scranton, George Westervelt, Jr., Stroudsburg, for appellant George Bolus.
W. Boyd Hughes, Scranton, Michael Shehadi, Throop, for appellee Frank Bolus.
William J. Garvey, Scranton, for appellee Charles Bolus.
casebody.head_matter:
411 A.2d 216
Frank BOLUS v. Charles BOLUS and George Bolus (two cases). Appeal of George BOLUS. Appeal of Anna BOLUS, Executrix of the Estate of Frank Bolus, Deceased.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Jan. 24, 1980.
Decided Feb. 25, 1980.
Philip H. Williams, Stroudsburg, Carlon M. O’Malley, Scranton, George Westervelt, Jr., Stroudsburg, for appellant George Bolus.
W. Boyd Hughes, Scranton, Michael Shehadi, Throop, for appellee Frank Bolus.
William J. Garvey, Scranton, for appellee Charles Bolus.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN and FLAHERTY, JJ.
